mapper.select: SELECT c.member_uid, COUNT(*) AS count FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.completion_status = 0 AND DATE(s.schedule_deadline) = CURRENT_DATE GROUP BY c.member_uid

SELECT c.member_uid, COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN s.completion_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.schedule_deadline BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(CURRENT_DATE) + 7) DAY) AND DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(CURRENT_DATE) + 1) DAY) GROUP BY c.member_uid

SELECT c.member_uid, COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN s.completion_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed FROM schedule s JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.category_id WHERE s.schedule_deadline BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH, '%Y-%m-01') AND LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY c.member_uid
